Container.Name: PlexConnect
Container.Description:
This is a Dockerfile setup for PlexConnect (fork) - https://github.com/rix1337/PlexConnect.[br] This dockerfile was forked from needo/PlexConnect docker.[br][br]
[b][span style='color: #E80000;']Directions:[/span][/b][br] Note: PlexConnect by default use ports 3380, 3353 and 3443[br] You therefore need these iptables rules in your unRAID go script:[br][br]
# Fix Ports for PlexConnect[br] iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -s 1.3.3.33/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 80 -j REDIRECT --to-ports 3380[br] iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -s 1.3.3.33/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 53 -j REDIRECT --to-ports 3353[br] iptables -t nat -A PREROUTING -s 1.3.3.33/32 -p tcp -m tcp --dport 443 -j REDIRECT --to-ports 3343[br][br]
[b]/mnt/cache/appdata/plexconnect[/b] : this path is used to store the PlexConnect Files.[br]
